channel.title: Dispomedica – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: Peel-Away Introducer WITH SWIVEL NUT
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Indication and Application

for the percutaneous introduction of diagnostic and therapeutic catheters with long dwelling time, such as:
  • permanent and temporary bipolar pacing electrodes
  • port catheters
  • urological catheters
item.content:encoded: The splittable sheath may be completely removed after catheter placement without necessity to re-position the catheter. A swivel nut ensures a safe connection of dilator and sheath to prevent detachment during insertion.

item.title: Percutaneous Introducer Sets
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Indication and Application

Venous introducers are intended for the percutaneous introduction of balloon-, temporary pacing-, and other catheters.
